alert.note: Alert for Osborne; Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 3:41PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern and eastern Rooks and southwestern Osborne Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 341 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Plainville to 8 miles northeast of Emmeram. Movement was north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Plainville, Stockton, Natoma, Zurich and Codell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
